titles.title: Expressing condolences to the family of Stan Mikita, and commemorating the life of Stan Mikita.
Expressing condolences to the family of Stan Mikita, and commemorating the life of Stan Mikita.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Commemorates the life and accomplishments of Stan Mikita on the event of his death and recognizes him for his contributions to the game of hockey, the Chicago Blackhawks franchise, and Chicago.
